Time Duration 1 year

Description

Landscape handles relationships with millions of insurance 
customers and is used by 19 businesses including Markerstudy 
Group, Direct Line Group, The Ardonagh Group and KGM.
In developing Landscape, as with all our insurance solutions, we spoke 
to stakeholders to make sure they got what they wanted, and we spoke 
to users to make sure they got what they needed. The result is hard-
working software – real business flexibility for policy admin, with its own 
comprehensive rating engine, no-nonsense claims 
management functionality and automated accounts.
We designed it with ultimate ease of use in mind. Cloud based and 
scalable for any size of insurance business, Landscape integrates 
seamlessly with aggregators and supports the rapid development of 
new websites.
Landscape supports all sales channels and, as it’s modular, it can be 
introduced component-by-component as well as all at once. It spans all 
areas of insurance including policy and claims, accounts, rating 
and channel management.

schema for storing user data.

Prize in MLH Hackathon.

 Devlop the project understanding

2018 – AKTU, Noida, Uttar Pradesh

ADDITIONAL SKILLS 

Microsoft Office package: Microsoft Word, Excel, Access
Database operation: Microsoft Office Access, MYSQL/SQL,Mongo
Programming: Basics C++, Java,python
Web Development: HTML, CSS, JQUERY,Ajax, Bash
Tools: MySQL Workbench, JIRA, Jmeter, Postman, Phabricator, 
AWS,Git,Superset, Kibana, Grafana

Manual Testing

• Strong in SDLC, STLC and Defect Life Cycle.
• Knowledge on Test Plan, Test Suits.
• Ability to write Test case, test Report.
• Knowledge of writing, reviewing and executing Test Cases.
• Knowledge on Functional, Integration, and System Testing.
• Knowledge on Smoke, Regression, Compatibility and various 

other types of Testing.
• Knowledge in Bug Life Cycle.

MYSQL/SQL :

• Strong knowledge on RDBMS concepts.
• Exposure to constraints (PK, FK, UNQ, CHECK).
• Strong knowledge on ER-diagrams.
• Hands on Experience on DDL, DML,DQL,TCL, DTL statements.
• Strong knowledge on Joins, Left outer join, Right outer join, Full 

outer joins.
• Strong knowledge of stored procedure, Views, Triggers .

I would be glad to provide any other information required by you. I would
appreciate an opportunity to meet you. This would enable me to explain
what I have learned in academia so far and how I can apply my learning
and knowledge to meet your requirements.

Shweta Sharma

	Experience Summary

		
· A MSBI professional with around 2.5 years of professional experience in BI technologies, working for Shree InfoSoft in travel domain.
· As part of my assignments, I have been involved in Functional Requirement Gathering and Analysis, Database Development and Support, Application Development & Maintenance.
· Well Versed with complete SDLC lifecycle including development, staging and production Environments.
· Emphasis on understanding business process & gathering requirements through research, formal-informal sessions with  business users  and  technical groups and translating business requirements into technical solutions.
· Strong Communication & Management skills with Excellent Role playing capabilities.
· Developed Power BI model used for travel reporting.
· Designed and documented the entire Architecture of Power BI Poc
· Used Power BI, Power Pivot to develop data analysis prototype, and used Power View and Power Map to visualize reports
· Worked on all types of transformations that are available in Power BI query editor.
· Creating Row level security with power bi and integration with power bi service portal.
· Published reports and dashboards using Power BI.
· Scheduled Automatic refresh and scheduling refresh in power bi service.
· Used Power BI Gateways to keep the dashboards and reports up to date.
· Significant proven experience at delivering Business Intelligence solutions (SSRS,SSIS) on the Microsoft technology platform including several versions of SQL Server like   2012 and  2014.
· Expertise in writing T-SQL Queries, Dynamic-queries, sub-queries and complex joins for generating Complex Stored Procedures, Triggers, User-defined Functions and Views.
· Expertise in using global variables, expressions and functions for the reports with experience in handling Sub reports in SSRS.
· Proficient in creating drill down, drill through, sub report, charts and linked reports using MS SSRS  2012/2014. 
· Generated multi parameterized reports in MS SSRS 2012/2014 allowing users the ability to make selections before executing reports; thus making them user friendly.

	
	

	Work Experience

	Organization
	Location
	Designation
	Time Period

	Shree Infosoft 
	Gurgaon
	Report Developer
	June’17 – Till Date

	

	Skill Set

	Skill Type
	Skill Area

	Databases
	SQL Server, 2012, 2014

	BI Tools
	 SSRS, Power BI, SSIS,T-SQL,SQL Server

	

	Education Qualification

	Year

	Institute/School, City

	Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi

	2010-2013
	BCA
	St. Xavier’s College, Ranchi

	Class XII –Jharkhand State Board
	Yogada Satsanga Mahavidyalya, Ranchi

	2006 - 2007
	Class X – Jharkhand State Board
	Prakash High School, Ranchi







	Organization
	Shree Infosoft                   June’17 – Present

	Business Overview
	Decision Source reporting projects are developed for analytical purpose. Decision reports are developed in order to track all the travel information for both phase of travel i.e. pre and post. We display information for different travel types like Air, Car, Rail and Hotel. There are more than 500 Post Trip and Pre Trip reports under this project which are developed for different customers associated with world’s fifth largest travel agency i.e. BCD Travel. BCD Travel’s approach is providing real-time intelligence to help avoid costs and mitigate risk before travel takes place.

	Role      :  Report Developer
Tools Used   :  SQL Server 2014, Power BI, SSRS, SQL Server Data Tools
Sector  :  Travel
Responsibilities : 
· Created, implemented and maintained a reporting suite of over 100+ standard reports while also customizing many reports to meet individual client needs.
· Requirement Gathering and Analysis Sessions with Client.
· Amending the old reports to meet new business requirements on quarterly and monthly basis.
· Providing resolution to user queries regarding reports.
· Amending the Scheduled reports, travel reports as per the change Management team request.
· Supporting the onshore team with process related queries and Customer queries related to reports development.
· Created various type of reports such as Complex drill down & drill through reports, Matrix reports, Sub reports and Charts using SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) based on Relational   databases.
· Built different types of chart reports using SSRS for the business requirement like column chart, pie charts.
· Design & Develop all kinds of reports using SSRS like drill down, drill through, sub report, linked report, charts, dashboard,
Indicators, gauge, multi-parameterized reports etc.
· Design, Development and Deployment dashboard based on pre-trip and post trip data.
· Fetching the data from SQL Server and creating Financial Reports/Dashboards as per the specification from the end user.
· Developed Power BI model used for travel reporting.
· Used various sources to pull data into Power BI such as Sql Server, excel, analysis services.
· Used Power BI, Power Pivot to develop data analysis prototype, and used Power View and Power Map to visualize reports.
· Worked on all types of transformations that are available in Power bi query editor.
· Creating Row level security with power bi and integration with power bi service portal.
· Published reports and dashboards using Power BI
· Scheduled Automatic refresh and scheduling refresh in power bi service.
· Used Power BI Gateways to keep the dashboards and reports up to date.

SSIS package is used for generating scheduled reports.
